  • sheepdog.models

sheepdog.models¶

This module generalizes the data model used by the sheepdog blueprint, and must be initialized using another models module to set the attributes of this module. For example, using gen3datamodel.models as the models:

sheepdog.models.init(gen3datamodel.models)

Then this module can be imported elsewhere in sheepdog:

from sheepdog import models

# This is effectively an alias of ``gen3datamodel.models.Project``.
models.Project
init(models)¶

Initialize this file with the same attributes as models to be imported elsewhere in sheepdog.

Parameters:models – a module that should implement the required attributes above
Returns:None
required_attrs = ['Program', 'Project', 'submission', 'VersionedNode']¶

The data model must implement these attributes.
